stsjorbsmod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
stsjorbsmod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

stsjorbsmod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
stsjorbsmod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
stsjorbsmod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

stsjorbsmod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
stsjorbsmod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

stsjorbsmod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
stsjorbsmod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !stsjorbsmod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

stsjorbsmod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
stsjorbsmod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !stsjorbsmod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
